question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies in the tech industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the tech industry and gather their basic details such as name, description, and relevant financial metrics.
Collect social media engagement data (likes, comments, reposts) for the identified tech companies from their Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube profiles.
Analyze the engagement metrics collected to identify trends over time, including which platform has the highest interaction rates for each company.
